standardActions.name: Multiattack
standardActions.desc: The void bat makes three Bite attacks.

standardActions.name: bite
standardActions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

standardActions.name: Sonic Scream (Recharge 5-6)
standardActions.desc: The void bat unleashes a reverberating scream in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) thunder damage on a failed save, or half on a successful save. On a failed save, the target is also paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

specialAbilities.name: Echolocation
specialAbilities.desc: The void bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

specialAbilities.name: Keen Hearing
specialAbilities.desc: The void bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

specialAbilities.name: Knockback
specialAbilities.desc: On a successful melee attack, the void bat may choose to forgo dealing damage and instead push the target up to 15 feet

specialAbilities.name: Void Traveler
specialAbilities.desc: Void bats do not need to breathe. They absorb ambient light through their hide for sustenance.
